title: Textile, ca. 1787
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block-printed, yellow and blue applied by brush, on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (warp two pieces glued together): 82 x 87 cm (32 5/16 x 34 1/4 in.)
Repeat (offset): 64.8 cm (25 1/2 in.)
description: Exotic plants including an aloe and a diminutive palm tree with a butterfly in bright colors on a white background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1787.
ca. 1787. Medium: cotton
Technique: block-printed, yellow and blue applied by brush, on plain weave foundation. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-105.
